document_data.mainbody:
he Red Stag was an inn located in the town of Caer Corwell on the island of Gwynneth in the Moonshae Isles during the midâ€“14 century DR.
The Red Stag was a quiet inn that served savory food. Most of the barmaids that worked here were quiet and shy.
A lady named Miriam owned the Red Stag.
